explains: n. 步枪，来复枪；步枪队（rifles）
v. 快速搜寻，匆忙翻找；偷窃，盗取；用力掷，猛踢（球）；为（枪、枪管或内膛）凿制来复线
wordGroup: assault rifle 突击步枪；冲锋枪
automatic rifle n. 自动步枪

sentences.en: When he appeared again, he was aiming the rifle at Wade.
sentences.cn: 他再次出现时，他正将步枪瞄准维德。

sentences.en: They shot him at point blank range with an automatic rifle.
sentences.cn: 他们用一支自动步枪在近距离射程内射中了他。

sentences.en: He aimed his rifle, fired a single shot, then ejected the spent cartridge.
sentences.cn: 他用步枪瞄准，开了一枪，接着排出了空弹壳。
